mapper.select:
/** 관리자의 사용자 관리 리스트 (selectUserListCnt)**/ SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_ROW_COUNT FROM USER_TABLE A INNER JOIN MEMBER B ON A.USER_ID = B.ID WHERE 1=1
AND UPPER(A.USER_ID) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{searchUserId}||'%')
AND UPPER(A.USER_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{searchUserName}||'%')
AND B.ENABLE = '2'

/** 관리자의 사용자 관리 상세 (selectUserDetail)**/ SELECT USER_ID , USER_NAME , USER_SSN , USER_WR_DATE , USER_UP_DATE , USER_GENDER , USER_PHONE , USER_EMAIL , SUBSTR(USER_SSN, 1,6) AS BIRTH FROM USER_TABLE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}

/** 사용자 신청 요금제 상세 정보 Ajax (selectUserApplyPlanAjax)**/
SELECT A.ORDER_NO , B.PLAN_NAME , A.ORDER_STATUS , A.ORDER_DATE , B.BIZ_NAME FROM PLAN_ORDER A LEFT OUTER JOIN PLAN_TABLE B ON A.PLAN_NO = B.PLAN_NO WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY A.ORDER_DATE DESC
